mcsema.mcsema – McSema’s internal functionality¶

class mcsema.msema.NativeModule¶

A module in native code in the form of a control flow graph.

class mcsema.msema.BinDescend(input_file)¶

Exposes the functionality of bin_descend. input_file specifies the path to the binary.

arch¶

Architecture of the binary. Set to “x86” or “x86-64”.

func_maps¶

List of paths to txt files containing information about external functions.

entry_symbols¶

List of entry points in the form of symbols.

entry_points¶

List of entry points in the form of addresses.

ignore_native_entry_points¶
debug_mode¶
native_module¶

readonly. Contains the NativeModule after a successful CFG recovery.

target_triple¶

readonly. Contains the target triple which can be passed to Lifter.

execute()¶

Recover CFG. Returns True on success and False otherwise.

execute(cfg_file)

Like execute(), but additionally save the CFG to cfg_file in McSema’s Protobuf format.

class mcsema.msema.Lifter(target_triple, cfg)¶

Exposes the functionality of cfg_to_bc. target_triple can be passed from :BinDescend. cfg can be either a path to a CFG file as a string or an instance of NativeModule.

native_module¶

NativeModule used as the input to lift.

target_triple¶
entry_points¶

List of names for entry points.

bitcode¶

readonly. Contains lifted bitcode after a successful translation.

execute()¶

Translate to LLVM. Resulting bitcode can be read from bitcode.

execute(bc_file)

Like execute(), but additionally save the bitcode to bc_file.
